messages.title: WHO IS REALLY ON YOUR SIDE?
messages.content: On education, Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats will recruit 20,000 more teachers and invest an extra £10 billion a year in schools. On health, they will properly fund our NHS and social care, treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health and have not damaged our NHS and social care services with their cuts, unlike other parties.

messages.title: JOIN THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS TO BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content: By backing the Liberal Democrats to demand better for our country to cut waiting times in NHS, tackle the climate emergency and recruit more teachers for our schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats will stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
Liberal Democrats will provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills & training throughout their lives.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Every Child the Best Start in Life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Hire 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats will stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
issues.economy: Liberal Democrats will provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills & training throughout their lives.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers and invest an extra £10 billion a year in schools.
issues.environment: Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
issues.health: Properly fund our NHS and social care, treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

quotes.text: We have an ambitious plan for the future of our country, where every single person and our planet can thrive.
A Liberal Democrat government will stop Brexit and deliver a brighter future for everyone.
